resources.string: All full version documents listed in this application are password protected and member’s only. We recommend a new subscriber should read the sample procedures and overview contents carefully and make an informed decision about the suitability before attempting to purchase the subscription. The sample procedures are smaller than their full versions and listed on the home screen under “Sample Content” icon. No procedure listed in this application provides misleading or false information intentionally and can be useful when applied correctly. We expect readers will understand the principles and concepts outlined in the published documents and rewrite their own version.

All payments are securely processed through In App Purchase facility. The payments could incur only if the user would made an informed decision to upgrade their free accounts to paid subscription. At the time of creating subscription accounts user will create a set of user ID and Password. User can change the Password as many times as they want through the “Profile” option. ID and Passwords will be deactivated by the application administrator subject to cancellation of a subscription.
